about_the_game:
Alien cats have arrived on Earth to capture their queen, but Cosmo the dog and Stella the cat won’t let them succeed! In this vibrant puzzle game, find hidden alien cats in unique formations, using magic yarn balls to reveal their hiding spots and win each level.  Can you survive the 300 days of their invasion? 

  • Each level represents a day, and your goal is to survive all the way to Day 300. Don’t worry—your progress is saved as you complete each day. However, if you’ve used all your lives, your progress resets!

  • Find the invading space cats in every level to win. Each color of alien cat hides in unique formations. It’s a simple concept, but the difficulty ramps up as you progress.

  • 16-bit style graphics with hand-drawn vibrant sprites, sprite scaling, and transparency effects!

  • Magical Yarn Balls - Use these items to get grid hints and manage them carefully as you go through the enemy waves.

  • Levels are procedurally generated, ensuring the objects hidden in the grid are different every time you play!

  • Catchy soundtrack, classic style tunes with a modern instrumentation.  You'll be humming in no time!

  • No DLC or in-app purchases! The only updates will be free improvements to enhance your experience.

    300 Levels. 3 Lives. Can You Survive?

name: Dog Gone Cats: Tail of 300 Days (Pawlike Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A deceptively challenging "roguelike" style vibrant puzzle game. Find all the invading cats. If you lose, you restart back to the beginning. Can you survive all 300 days?
